content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 15.8%) and broad participation (Breadth: 6/8 sectors positive), confirming a strong bull phase.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Retail & Food and Heavy Industry are leading: MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND; BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND. Transportation also outperforming: THYAO (1W: +6.29% | 1M: +7.76%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Construction & REIT are lagging: KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND; TKFEN (1W: -1.17% | 1M: +7.33%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND; BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND; SOKM (1W: +8.05% | 1M: +7.96%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND; SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND; HEKTS (1W: -5.41% | 1M: -7.19%) BELOW TREND; ALARK (1W: -3.89% | 1M: +6.52%) CORRECTION; GARAN (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +4.15%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND; BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND; SOKM (1W: +8.05% | 1M: +7.96%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Cautious but constructive: AKBNK (1W: +0.41% | 1M: +7.50%) ABOVE TREND; ISCTR (1W: +0.63% | 1M: +2.99%) ABOVE TREND; GARAN (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +4.15%) CORRECTION; YKBNK (1W: -1.26% | 1M: +4.67%) CORRECTION.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Industrial cycle intact with leadership in defence and autos: ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +17.95%) ABOVE TREND; EREGL (1W: +1.82% | 1M: +2.15%) ABOVE TREND; VESTL (1W: -1.09% | 1M: -10.30%) BELOW TREND is the key lag.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Mixed but holding gains: TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND; GUBRF (1W: +6.54% | 1M: +15.31%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +5.51% | 1M: -0.35%) RECOVERY; SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND is the structural lag.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Overweight cyclical leaders (Retail, Heavy Industry, select Transportation) and maintain trim on lagging Tech & Construction; use RISK-ON to add high-conviction longs and tighten stops on names showing RECOVERY/ CORRECTION.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND for momentum continuation; TOASO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +17.95%) ABOVE TREND for auto cycle upside; TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND for commodity-driven moves; KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND for downside risk/mean-reversion signals.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Retail & Food for earnings/consumption readthrough; Heavy Industry for momentum and export demand; Technology & Telecom for downside risk and possible reversal attempts.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 reaction to a breakout above recent multi-week highs for confirmation of continuation and a drop below the last swing low for a corrective phase; near-term catalysts: domestic CPI and CBRT commentary, USD/TRY moves, and company-specific earnings/updates.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON market: low vol (15.8%) and 6/8 sectors positive, favoring cyclicals. Key opportunities in ASELS, Retail names and autos; main risks are concentrated in Technology & Telecom and a handful of Energy Chemicals names (SASA, HEKTS) that could drag sentiment if weakness persists.
